song_lyric:
作曲 : PISSY
 作词 : PISSY/ROY
PISSY：
Revolution means evolution
I"m analyzing all the human motions I"m calculating all the possibilities

Now fvck up virginity of innovation
U might think I"m too aggressive
to mention it
Problem is you never think with your brain
And you always come up with that explanation
When you can"t explain em
You think god is with em
I ain"t here
For manipulatin"
Pioneer in human treatment
I pick it up my pen and paper
Not for

I ain"t no tongue twister rapper
My shlt here pushing e-one forward Human power can be way too stronger than

Gods we created many years backwards
Now who Is Yehovah,
 Buddha,
 Allah
Huluvah?
No disrespect for these characters
But there"s barrier between scenarios
It caused misunderstanding among all these
Conflicts and troubles then prejudice
It used to be the tool of monarchique
Now come with me to find out the truth
And we going like
Revolution means Evolution
I"m here to break it down
All the stubborn genes of your a*s even if you don"t believe it

And the evolution"s still going on
On your kids" reveries
When they sleep
They gon see
The whole pageantry
But no more lies and no bullshit
Just trust yourself
Human beings are Gods yeah
When I write this sh*t down
I feel like I was riding on light cuz I see it clear
On the dimension of time
Human history is inferior such
That we can"t even stop
Getting trapped in the theory we raised
Amaze stays amaze
Who"s gonna say
Human beings can"t be better this way?
ROY:
Chan said bodhi ain"t bo tree
That means everything is illusory
After addin my cursory opinions upon this holy phrase
Those words can be motivated
I don"t see myself as a believer or a nonbeliever
But i can see the human culture has been delivered
Some religions always calming people down from fever
Some religions turnin to the weapons of the killers
Lucifer died in the morning
Jesus won"t bless him,
 lack fortune
Buddha didn"t know him he"s foreign
Allah said he"s not my problem
You think im talkin exactly nonsense
But im conscious
Reality"s way more ironic
You talkin having faith in god when your blood is rot
Body and soul already sold to money
I don"t wanna doubt anybody though
Dis innocent people
Lookin in the mirror
Angle or evil
A Halo,
a Bible,
a needle,
a pistol
Needles gonna get you high as fvck
Pistols let the haters pay for blood
What you gonna choose by holding your faith
Get your hands dirty or still believe in god
They say China"s chaotic people don"t have religions
I say religious people are fugazi and unpitying
We both are blinded i gusee
It"s inevitable consequence in human evolution
Gods shall get choked by science
Religions"ll no more being virus
 So don"t fight for the gods that ain"t a wise choice
Gotta fight for yourself and ignore those voices
People need to have faith
I never doubt about it
Faith keeps you stronger
Gives you a sober brain
Take it as your engine in a positive way
It"s not very helpful by doing a simply pray
Still believing in no pain mo gain
You trust the gods they wrote you this phrase
At the end of the beat i recall this thing
After all gods are dead the music still remains
